-e ---

𓌷 •schema حكم ḥukum

𓌷 = 𓌴 + 𓐙 #mAa 𓐝 #M 𓐛 #im imper…

Maat : Wahrheit 𓅓𓌷𓂝𓏏𓆄𓏛𓏥 truly truthfully true

𐎠𐎼𐎫 a-r-t /arta/ ortho right

𓃀 𓏤 𓌷 𓂝 𓏜 | truth | bèrdat > veridad
𓃀 𓏤 𓌷 𓂝 𓏜 | truth | [bu]maath µb.mꜣꜥt phlegmao beingmath

𓐣 𓌃 𓂧 𓅱 𓀁 𓏪 judgement > mot
𓐣 𓂝 𓏛 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓏛 | judge | ⇔ writ, right
𓌷 𓂝 𓏏 𓏮 𓆄 𓆄 𓆗 𓆗 | (dual) judgements | reverse : deem 𐌳𐍉𐌼𐍃 dōms
𓌷 𓂝 𓏏 𓏮 𓆄 𓆄 𓆗 𓆗 | ⇔ դատավոր datavor (judge?)

𓊃 𓆓 𓅓 𓄔 | ⲥⲱⲧⲉⲙ | hear ⇔ deem

𓇬 𓈖 𓌷 𓂝 | true being, relality | Sein Mwahrheit
𓇬 𓌴 𓐙 | true being, relality | Sein 𓐙
